attacks.name: Entrancing Melody
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Fury Cutter
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. If 1 of them is heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage. If 2 of them are heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage. If all of them are heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 100 more damage.
